# start()

**Instance Method**

Start a new multiplayer game, promoting the local state of the table to all connected peers

## Declaration

```swift
func start()
```

## Joining multiplayer games

- **join()**: Join an existing game started between the connected peers
- **leave()**: Leave the current multiplayer game
- **terminate()**

items.description: Join an existing game started between the connected peers
